name: Sig.NULL (itch)
description:
NAME
sig.null - socket drones manipulation progam.

SYNOPSIS
sig.null [OPTIONS, ...]

DESCRIPTION
sig.null
uses internal directives to manipulate socket drones
and solve information conflicts.
OPTIONS
-E --enter
Chooses internal options or start conflict investigation.

-l --leftarrow
Navigation to the left direction on the conflict map.
Move drone left (if controls not reconfigured).

-r --rightarrow
Navigation to the right direction on the conflict map.
Move drone right (if controls not reconfigured).

-u --uparrow
Internal menu upwards navigation.
Navigation to the up direction on the conflict map.
Move drone upwards (if controls not reconfigured).

-d --downarrow
Internal menu downwards navigation.
Navigation to the down direction on the conflict map.
Move drone downwards (if controls not reconfigured).

-a --space
Starts conflict investigation.
Interaction with objects (if controls not reconfigured).

-z
Undo last action if possible (if controls not reconfigured).
NOTE: please, avoid time flow redirection.

-r
Rewinds all actions and reset conflict (if controls not reconfigured).
NOTE: not affected by time flow manipulations.

-q --escape
Leave current conflict. Leave the conflicts map.

CONFIGURATION
Controls can be reconfigured via internal menu.
Secured protocol can be used for GameJolt supporting.

KNOWN ISSUES
Dead end WARNING requires another solution.
Use -r option to reset the conflict.

Time flow redirection WARNING in some cases.
Don't try redirect it backwards. Use -r option to reset the conflict.

Impossible conflicts CAUTION!!!
Don't try solve "Exceptions Storage" conflicts.
This is special stack of unsolvable conflicts detected by ADC system.
This sector will be closed in future.
